subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Clint Bowyer started from the pole and led 222 of the 300 laps at New Hampshire International Speedway, in the first race of the Chase. Bowyer won by 6.469 seconds over Jeff Gordon.
snippet: Clint Bowyer started from the pole and led 222 of the 300 laps at New Hampshire International Speedway, in the first race of the Chase. Bowyer won by 6.469 seconds over Jeff Gordon.
